title: Elven Bow (1C41)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Ranged Weapon
Game Text:	Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.
Lore:	”'We live now upon an island amid many perils, and our hands are more often upon the bowstring than upon the harp.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Version: ++.
